name: mm-grid
description: A fully styled, configurable data grid with item recycling.

attributes.name: data
attributes.description: The array of data or mm-collection to render into the grid.

attributes.name: itemTemplate
attributes.description: A string pointing to a custom item template ID or template DOM fragment

attributes.name: viewportWidth
attributes.description: The width in pixels of the internal grid viewport. (For grids that expand beyond their container)

attributes.name: sortField
attributes.description: Set/Get the current sort data field

properties.name: index
properties.description: The current first item index at the top of the grid
